creator: drobert@bfm.bm
text:
A timeout of 60 secs is hardcoded in the startup code for JNIEndpoint. This is 
limiting, especially when initializing a complex webapp on a slow platform (in 
my case, the ultimate in slow platforms, an old AS/400). It should be possible 
to set the timeout in either the workers.properties file or in the server.xml 
file as an attribute of the Connector tag (or some other means).

Done, thanks for the sugestion. ( in 3.3, I added a system property, easy 
to set in workers.properties ). Please test and send feedback ( maybe some
patches to the docs, we would apreciate any information that may help other
users run with jni )
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
